document_data.caption: A map showing the Channathwood south of the Rathgaunt Hills.
document_data.name: Channathwood
document_data.mainbody: The '''Channathwood''' was a small forest found in the southern [[Shaar]] near the border of [[Lapaliiya]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Geography: The forest sat along the southern edge of the [[Rathgaunt Hills]] north of the [[Swagdar]] running roughly east to west. It lay roughly halfway between the [[Great Rift]] in the east and the [[Shaareach]] in the west. The Channathwood was the source of the [[River Channath]].
